S04bsu012_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālī mahānagarī tenānuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu012_u:6_0: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
S04bsu012_u:6_1: sārdham aṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiś ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā
S04bsu012_u:7_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīr dharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanād ekaṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu012_u:7_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S04bsu012_u:7_2: bhagavantam etad avocat - deśayatu bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāmāni,
S04bsu012_u:9: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānām anugraham upādāya /
S04bsu012_u:10: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S04bsu012_u:13: nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya /
S04bsu012_u:15: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye /
S04bsu012_u:19: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:20_0: tatra bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu012_u:20_1: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś ca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu012_u:21: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāny abhūvan /
S04bsu012_u:23: prathamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
S04bsu012_u:24: tadā mama śarīraprabhayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇā lokadhātavo bhrājeraṃs tapyeran viroceran /
S04bsu012_u:28: (dvitīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
S04bsu012_u:29: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇir iva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:30: vipulakāyas tadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu012_u:31: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāś ca,
S04bsu012_u:34: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca)
S04bsu012_u:37: yadāham anāgate - - - - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātor akṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ /
S04bsu012_u:38: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt //
S04bsu012_u:39: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpto 'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāś ca,
S04bsu012_u:40: te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran //
S04bsu012_u:41: pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:45: mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt //
S04bsu012_u:46_0: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca
S04bsu012_u:46_1: me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā
S04bsu012_u:46_2: andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:47: te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu012_u:48_0: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya
S04bsu012_u:48_1: ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā
S04bsu012_u:51: nīrogāś ca nirupadravāś ca te syur yāva bodhiparyavasānam //
S04bsu012_u:52_0: aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā yaḥ kaścin mātṛgrāmo
S04bsu012_u:52_1: nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo
S04bsu012_u:53: tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam //
S04bsu012_u:54_0: navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpte 'haṃ
S04bsu012_u:54_2: vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam //
S04bsu012_u:55: daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:56: ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhir upadrutā vimānitāś ca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:57: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran //
S04bsu012_u:58_0: ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya
S04bsu012_u:58_1: ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t)
S04bsu012_u:60: ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam //
S04bsu012_u:61: dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ
S04bsu012_u:67: imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān //
S04bsu012_u:68_0: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu012_u:68_1: yat praṇidhānaṃ yac ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tan na śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum /
S04bsu012_u:69: suviśuddhaṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ vyapagataśilāśarkarakaṭhalyam apagatakāmadoṣam apagatāpāyaduḥkhaśabdam apagatamātṛgrāmam /
S04bsu012_u:72: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣām aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau,
S04bsu012_u:75: yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ /
S04bsu012_u:76: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam //
S04bsu012_u:77: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma - santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:79: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam,
S04bsu012_u:81: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate /
S04bsu012_u:82: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:83: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayam eva na paribhuñjanti,
S04bsu012_u:87: te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaś cyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā /
S04bsu012_u:88: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
S04bsu012_u:89: tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)
S04bsu012_u:91: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataś cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante,
S04bsu012_u:93: te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhir arthikā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:94: dānābhiratāś ca bhaviṣyanti dānasya ca varṇavādinaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:95: sarvam api parityāgenānupūrveṇa karacaraṇaśīrṣanayanaṃ ca māṃsaśoṇitaṃ (ca)
S04bsu012_u:98: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
S04bsu012_u:104: na ca tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ gambhīram artham ājānanti /
S04bsu012_u:108: mārapakṣikās te tādṛḥā mohapuruṣāḥ svayaṃ kumārgapratipannāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:110: teṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhena narakavāsagatir bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:112: yais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ ḥrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:113: teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ sumukhībhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:114: te tataḥ cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāḥayāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:115: te gṛhān utsṛjya tathāgataḥāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti //
S04bsu012_u:116: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:118: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:119: te anekavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena tataś cyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapadyante /
S04bsu012_u:120: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti /
S04bsu012_u:124: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:126: tīkṣṇendriyāś ca bhaviṣyanti paṇḍitā vyaktā meghāvinaś ca /
S04bsu012_u:131: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti /
S04bsu012_u:132: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalam abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
S04bsu012_u:133: anyonyam ahitakāmā nityaṃ parasparam anarthāya parākrāmanti /
S04bsu012_u:134: te ca vanadevatām āvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca /
S04bsu012_u:138: tasya śatror nāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:139: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:141: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāś ca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ //
S04bsu012_u:142: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ etāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:143: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsam upavasanti,
S04bsu012_u:144: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:145: yeṣām evaṃpraṇidhānam evamabhiprāyam - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitāyus tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu012_u:146: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:147: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti,
S04bsu012_u:153: te tataś cyutvā iha manuṣyaloke upapatsyante /
S04bsu012_u:155: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:156: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante /
S04bsu012_u:160: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:161: tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ //
S04bsu012_u:162_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantam etad avocat - ahaṃ bhagavan paścime
S04bsu012_u:162_1: kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca tasya bhagavato
S04bsu012_u:163: antaśaḥ svapnāntaram api buddhanāmakaṃ karṇapuṭeṣu upasaṃhārayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu012_u:164: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu012_u:168: tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam /
S04bsu012_u:171: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:173: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti /
S04bsu012_u:174: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu012_u:177: hṛtaṃ vā ojaḥ punar api pratisaṃharati /
S04bsu012_u:181: yaś ca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:184_0: śucinā śucim āhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite
S04bsu012_u:186: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni /
S04bsu012_u:200: yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā,
S04bsu012_u:202: tais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
S04bsu012_u:209: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇam upagṛhṇanti,
S04bsu012_u:216: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:217: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:219: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
S04bsu012_u:220: yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam anusmaret,
S04bsu012_u:224: janayiṣyati abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyas tīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān /
S04bsu012_u:226: na ca śakyate amanuṣyais tasya ojo 'pahartum //
S04bsu012_u:227_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma - śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda
S04bsu012_u:227_1: pattīyasi yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu012_u:228: athavā te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare?
S04bsu012_u:229: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
S04bsu012_u:232: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām,
S04bsu012_u:233: sa sumerur vā parvatarājaḥ sthānāc calet,
S04bsu012_u:234: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet /
S04bsu012_u:235: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:236: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyanti katham etan nāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti?
S04bsu012_u:239: teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāya na hitāya na sukhāya vinipātāy bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:247: abhūmir atra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān iti /
S04bsu012_u:251: tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryām apramāṇam,
S04bsu012_u:254: ākāṅkṣamāṇo 'haṃ tasya tathāgatasya kalpaṃ vā (BhgSū, Vaidya 171)
S04bsu012_u:257: na tv eva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistarāntam adhigantum //
S04bsu012_u:258: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyām eva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:259_0: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S04bsu012_u:259_1: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - bhaviṣyanti bhadanta
S04bsu012_u:259_2: bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā dīrghavyādhinā (kṣīṇagātrāḥ)
S04bsu012_u:260: kṣuttarṣābhyāṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhoṣṭhā maraṇābhimukhā rorudyamānebhir mitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣair ākarṣyamāṇāś ca /
S04bsu012_u:261: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratām upanīyate /
S04bsu012_u:262: yac ca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddham eva yat kiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu012_u:263: tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate /
S04bsu012_u:265: gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā tathājñāmājñāpayati /
S04bsu012_u:266: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:268: sthānam etad vidyate yat tasya tad vijñānaṃ punar api pratinivarteta,
S04bsu012_u:270: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime)
S04bsu012_u:271: divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punar api nivarteta,
S04bsu012_u:273: tasya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayam eva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu012_u:274: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpam akuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati /
S04bsu012_u:275: tasmāc chrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā //
S04bsu012_u:276: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvam etad avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā?
S04bsu012_u:277: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ,
S04bsu012_u:278: tais tasyāturasyārthāya sapta divasāni āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasitavyam,
S04bsu012_u:279: bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇair yathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu012_u:280: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam /
S04bsu012_u:284: ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:286: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate,
S04bsu012_u:289: punar aparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānām upadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu012_u:290: vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā (BhgSū, Vaidya 172)
S04bsu012_u:291: vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā samutthitā,
S04bsu012_u:292: amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhir vā vipad vā samupasthitā,
S04bsu012_u:293: tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
S04bsu012_u:295: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā /
S04bsu012_u:296_0: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato
S04bsu012_u:298: sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ /
S04bsu012_u:299: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti /
S04bsu012_u:301: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya āyurvarṇabalārogyaiśvaryābhivṛddhir bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu012_u:302: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ bodhisattvam evam avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra parikṣīṇāyuḥ punar evābhivivardhate?
S04bsu012_u:303: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikāc chrutam - santi akālamaraṇāni /
S04bsu012_u:312: caturtham akālamaraṇaṃ ye agnidāhena kālaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu012_u:313: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante /
S04bsu012_u:318: navamam akālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānam alabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu012_u:321: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ,
S04bsu012_u:333_0: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantam evam
S04bsu012_u:333_1: āhuḥ - śrutam asmābhiś ca bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya
S04bsu012_u:335: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:338: sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu012_u:340: nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:341: yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati,
S04bsu012_u:347: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ,
S04bsu012_u:348: yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatām anusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ //
S04bsu012_u:349: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ?
S04bsu012_u:351: bhagavān āha - tena hi ānanda dharmaparyāyam idaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaram iti dhāraya,
S04bsu012_u:361: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
